AddMassNick(ulong, IUser, int, string, out MassNick)

Adds a new MassNick to the collection if it doesn't already exist for the given guild.

Declaration
public bool AddMassNick(ulong guildId, IUser user, int total, string operationType, out UserPunishService.MassNick returnMassNick)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ulong guildId

The ID of the guild.
IUser user

The user who started the operation.
int total

The total number of operations to be performed.
string operationType

The type of operation to be performed.
UserPunishService.MassNick returnMassNick

The MassNick object that was added to the collection. If a MassNick already exists for the guild, this will be null.
Returns
Type Description
bool

True if a new MassNick was added to the collection, false otherwise.
